name: Ascension (DiamondGamer61)
description:
this is a game.   you play it.   it is pretty boring.     until floating text tries to kill you...

This is my second game I have made. I hope you enjoy. This version isn't finished. But I'll be sure to update it soon! I am constantly improving and will work on this game after this game jam finished.
